text: Moses is a character with a complicated identity. He's an Israelite, but he's raised in the house of Pharaoh. It's as if from this moment forward, he's gonna be asked to trust that who I am is a part of this family that I was born into, but have no relational connection to anymore. And I'm just supposed to go back and dive in as if I'm this people's leader.
